Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards.effects

Class EffectHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards.effects.EffectHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class EffectHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class executes the effect. Every time an action needs to be executed passes through the EffectHandler. This is the core class of the logic of the model.
    See Also:

      • useEffect

        public void useEffect​(Effect effect,
                      EffectArgument target)
               throws EffectException,
                      PropertiesException
        The method responsible for the execution of every kind of effect: - WeaponCard effect; - PowerUpCard effect; - Action effect.
        Parameters:
        effect - The Effect to be executed.
        target - The Target of the effect.
        Throws:
        EffectException - If there are some problems during the execution of the effect.
        PropertiesException - If some properties are violated.

      • updateCardUsageVariables

        public void updateCardUsageVariables​(Effect effect,
                                     WeaponCard card)
        Updates the card usage variables given the Effect executed and the WeaponCard with the effect.
        Parameters:
        effect - The effect executed.
        card - The card to be updated.
